data.description: Draw a 2D X-Y scale and use it.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module adds a 2D scale to a GD image. It needs a GD::Image
    object to work.

    See
    <http://search.cpan.org/~burak/GD-XYScale-1.2/lib/GD/XYScale.pm> for
    a larger explanation.
